column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I'm only taking off one star because of how hard it is to get in. The food is amazing and my husband and I are on a tour of Chicago steak houses to try them all and decide for ourselves. It's expensive yes
column2: but have you ever heard of you get what you pay for? It's true here. Also
column3: the staff is very attentive. I dropped my knife in a very non dramatic way and a minute later a new knife was brought to me before I could even ask for one. The service was also not overbearing like swift and sons. We'll be back if we can ever get in.
